Subject: Total Energy Supply
Description: Total Energy Supply (TES) in Afghanistan for the years 2014 and 2019 is provided in the text.

Subject: Non-renewable
Description: Non-renewable energy supply is a part of the Total Energy Supply (TES) in Afghanistan for the years 2014 and 2019.

Subject: Air particulate matter
Description: Air particulate matter (PM2.5) levels are monitored in Afghanistan for the years 2014 to 2019.

Subject: Net capacity change
Description: Net capacity change in gigawatts (GW) is monitored in Afghanistan for the years 2016 to 2021.

Subject: Petajoules
Description: Energy consumption in petajoules (PJ) is monitored in Afghanistan for the years 2014 to 2019.

Subject: IRENA Joint Policies and Measures Database
UN SDG Database
Description: UN SDG Database uses data from IRENA among other sources.

Subject: UN SDG Database
Description: UN SDG Database uses data from WHO among other sources.

Subject: UN SDG Database
Description: UN SDG Database uses data from World Bank among other sources.

Subject: UN SDG Database
Description: UN SDG Database uses data from IEA among other sources.

Subject: UNSD Energy Balances
Description: UNSD Energy Balances uses data from IRENA among other sources.

Subject: REN21 Global Status Report
Description: REN21 Global Status Report uses data from IRENA among other sources.

Subject: Harmonised System
Description: Energy trade includes all commodities in Chapter 27 of the Harmonised System (HS).
